Spec.title: Level 1-20 (can run RF after fire mastery & 100 Fire Res)
Level 61-80 Swapping Purity of Elements to Purity of Fire + Skitter
Level 81-93 Dropping Determ for Malev (50%+ Phys Conversion)
Level 95+ Double Cluster (prob want defiance of destiny ammy)

PathOfBuilding.Notes:
One of the nice benefits of Chieftain is being able to just Stack Fire Resistance. The only other resist you'll look out for is Chaos Resistance.
^xB97123What auras to use in Campaign?^7 In the very early acts we'll be using Vitality, Later in Act 3 We'll gain Access to ^x7070FFPurity of Elements^7 & ^xAF6025Determination^7. Use the Purity of Elements and hold the Determ till once you pickup the Auras Reservation nodes. After securing Freeze Immunity on the Panthon we'll drop Purity of Elements in Favor of Purity of Fire & Skitterbots.
Rare Jewels usually end up being expensive, remember you can look for many different combinations. I'll list some usable stats you can mix and match to save currency ^xB97123Prefix^7 Life, Fire Damage ^xB97123Suffix^7 Increased Damage, Fire damage over time multiplier, damage over time multiplier, area damage, burning damage, chaos resistance, dexterity,
^xB97123Which Large Cluster Jewels^7^xB97123 to use?^7 Anything with Prismatic heart or Burning bright in the front. You can also opt out for 12 Passsive clusters and try to craft them for stats like + Life & Chaos Res with Increased effect.
^xB97123Which Medium Cluster Jewels^7 ^xAF6025to use?^7 Flow of life + Any combination
^xB97123Swapping Determ for Malevolence^7 You can do this swap when you have around 60% Conversion. Usually Taste of Hate + Cloak of Flame + Chaos Conversion on tree. This setup will feel MUCH Better with ^xD02090Defiance of Destiny^7 (Amulet)
^xB97123What % Roll do I go for on Adorned?^7
6% Fire Multi Jewels = 117% 7% Fire Multi Jewels = 129%
(You don't need all of these sources. This is just a list of how to Acquire Phys Taken as X Element) I recommend 60% Physical Damage taken as before dropping Determination.
Cloak of Flame = 40% Physical Damage taken as Fire
Taste of Hate = 15% Physical Damage taken as Cold
Corrupted Rise of the Phoenix = 6% to 8% Physical damage taken a
Crafted on rare helmet - 8% Physical Damage taken as Fire.
Watchers Eye Purity of Fire - 8-12% Physical Damage taken as Fire
Arm/Es Mastery - 10% Physical Damage taken from hits as Chaos
Dawnbreaker 10% - 20% Physical Damage taken as Fire
Rare Body Armor - 6% Physical Damage taken as Fire & Lightning (if using rare body)
